entry.title: BitBox Bitcoin ATM
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bitcoin Capitalist
Type:
Price: 3500.00

The Bitbox ATM was developed to introduce Bitcoin to emerging markets worldwide, especially in regions where many people remain unbanked. Engineered to be lightweight and compact, the Bitbox ATM is cost-effective and can be easily shipped anywhere in the world. Unlike competitors, the Bitbox ATM doesn't involve royalties and is compatible with third-party ATM software. Additionally, Bitbox ATMs offer ATM software, server hosting, and customer support services as needed. BitBox ATMs is committed to advancing financial freedom globally through Bitcoin, and we believe the Bitbox ATM is a valuable tool to achieve this mission.

Details 

  • Designed to be wall mounted 
  • Bluetooth lock & key for added security 
  • Cash box hold 600 Bank notes
  • 4-6 Week production time
  • Software not included
  • Shipping fees & import tax not included 

Specifications 

  • Weight - 50 Lbs
  • Material - 1.5mm Cold-Roll Steel Frame 
  • Screen - 10.1" Touch Screen
  • Operating System - Linux - Xubuntu 20.04LTS
  • Computer - Intel® Celeron® Processor N3350 
  • Network Connections - Ethernet or Wi-Fi (2.4G Hz or 5G Hz)
  • Bill Validator - SCN - 600 Notes
  • Cameras - QR Scanner 
  • Voltage - 100‐240VAC
